description: Schema for the AWS Route53 Recovery Readiness ResourceSet Resource and API.. Source:- https://github.com/aws-cloudformation/aws-cloudformation-resource-providers-route53-recovery-readiness.git

NLBResource.description: The Network Load Balancer resource that a DNS target resource points to.

Arn.description: A Network Load Balancer resource Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

NLBResource.title: AWSRoute53RecoveryReadinessResourceSetNLBResourceDefinition

R53ResourceRecord.description: The Route 53 resource that a DNS target resource record points to.
R53ResourceRecord.title: AWSRoute53RecoveryReadinessResourceSetR53ResourceRecordDefinition

TargetResource.description: The target resource that the Route 53 record points to.
TargetResource.title: AWSRoute53RecoveryReadinessResourceSetTargetResourceDefinition

DNSTargetResource.description: A component for DNS/routing control readiness checks.

DomainName.description: The domain name that acts as an ingress point to a portion of the customer application.

RecordSetId.description: The Route 53 record set ID that will uniquely identify a DNS record, given a name and a type.

HostedZoneArn.description: The hosted zone Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that contains the DNS record with the provided name of the target resource.

RecordType.description: The type of DNS record of the target resource.

DNSTargetResource.title: AWSRoute53RecoveryReadinessResourceSetDNSTargetResourceDefinition

Resource.description: The resource element of a ResourceSet

ResourceArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AWS resource.

ComponentId.description: The component identifier of the resource, generated when DNS target resource is used.

ReadinessScopes.description: A list of recovery group Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) and cell ARNs that this resource is contained within.

Resource.title: AWSRoute53RecoveryReadinessResourceSetResourceDefinition

ResourceSetName.description: The name of the resource set to create.

Resources.description: A list of resource objects in the resource set.

ResourceSetType.description:
The resource type of the resources in the resource set. Enter one of the following values for resource type: 

AWS: :AutoScaling: :AutoScalingGroup, AWS: :CloudWatch: :Alarm, AWS: :EC2: :CustomerGateway, AWS: :DynamoDB: :Table, AWS: :EC2: :Volume, AWS: :ElasticLoadBalancing: :LoadBalancer, AWS: :ElasticLoadBalancingV2: :LoadBalancer, AWS: :MSK: :Cluster, AWS: :RDS: :DBCluster, AWS: :Route53: :HealthCheck, AWS: :SQS: :Queue, AWS: :SNS: :Topic, AWS: :SNS: :Subscription, AWS: :EC2: :VPC, AWS: :EC2: :VPNConnection, AWS: :EC2: :VPNGateway, AWS::Route53RecoveryReadiness::DNSTargetResource

Tags.description: A tag to associate with the parameters for a resource set.

title: AWSRoute53RecoveryReadinessResourceSetProperties
